name: Darkmore
description:
Once again the Great Darkness has fallen on Darkmore. The village has survived many times before... will it survive once again?

This is a city builder / survival concept game where you lead the village of Darkmore through the Great Darkness. Build torches to explore your surroundings, gather resources, build workshops and find a way to save your population from starvation.

Made in Unity in 10 days for Callum Upton's Game Jam #2.

Special thanks to Lucky Leaf Gaming for the initial concept.

THIRD PARTY CREDITS
